author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

The aim of this PR is **to discuss the possible approach** to retrieval of PPS diamond detector mapping from XML and CondDB.

Moving mapping records to CondDB would give us flexibility in upcoming run.
On the other hand migration of all mapping records (including Run2) means validation of Run2 data reconstruction.

Therefore we explore the possibility to stay with XML-based records for Run2 and 2022 data, while retrieving the records from CondDB in 2023 run.

#### PR validation:

Validation is still ongoing, this PR is meant to serve as a place to discuss the code.
title: Retrieval of PPS diamond detector mapping from XML and CondDB
